name: Achhe Din
description:
Theme:Political

Welcome to Achhe Din, where you being fed up of the current political parties in your area decide to start your own party!Set up your party from scratch,run campaigns ,interact with people, sign deals and then contest elections.You can make promises to people to gain their votes,but remember to fulfill them or lose your reputation and trust!Achhe din provides a full sandbox of options where you can choose the ethical path, the unethical path or a bit of both ,much like real world politics!Your decisions will matter during and after elections as you rise or fall in people's eyes.Contest elections like municipal,local,state and even national(in development) as you spread your party across the whole country.

Note:This is a game developed for the BYOG 2018 game jam. The game was built in 2 days and the current files are for a simple prototype of the game for the submission.We'd love to hear your comments and feature requests as we continue to build the game!Thanks!
